entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, 1.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: St. Anthony Airport 11:30 AM NST Saturday 11 March 2023

Temperature: 1.6°C
Pressure: 100.7 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 75 %
Dewpoint: -2.4°C

Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60 except gusting to 80 along parts of the coast early this afternoon. Temperature steady near plus 1. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Saturday 11 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries or freezing drizzle this evening and after midnight. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 3. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Saturday 11 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 1 except plus 3 south of Hare Bay.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northeast 20 gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High minus 1 except plus 3 south of Hare Bay. Wind chill near minus 9. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Saturday 11 March 2023
